results.idea: Momentum / Residual Volatility (risk-adjusted momentum)
results.description: Applied SUGGESTION1 by combining momentum and residual volatility. SUGGESTION2 not applicable (no vector fields). SUGGESTION3 not needed (both fields coverage = 1.0). SUGGESTION4 applied: used high userCount/alphaCount factors rsk70_mfm2_usfast_momentum and rsk70_mfm2_usfast_resvol. Kept KEEP_IN_MIND: used 2 datafields and 2 operators. Confidence set to 0.88 because momentum scaled by resvol is a well-known robust alpha.

results.idea: Momentum scaled by Size (small-cap momentum tilt)
results.description: Used multiple fields (momentum and size) per SUGGESTION1. No vector fields => SUGGESTION2 N/A. Coverage high so ts_backfill not used. Chose rsk70_mfm2_usfast_momentum and rsk70_mfm2_usfast_size (good userCount). Kept implementation compact (<=2 fields, <=7 ops). Confidence 0.8 (size interacts with momentum but seasonality possible).

results.idea: Specific-return mean reversion (idiosyncratic reversal)
results.description: Combined daily_specific_return with resvol to capture mean reversion in idiosyncratic moves (SUGGESTION1). No vector ops. Coverage 1.0 so ts_backfill not applied. Used high userCount daily_specific_return. Kept operators minimal. Confidence 0.86 based on empirical idiosyncratic reversal evidence.

results.idea: Short-interest momentum (short interest rising momentum)
results.description: Used rsk70_mfm2_usfast_shortint (high userCount) with momentum (SUGGESTION1). No vector fields. Coverage high. Implementation limited to 2 fields. Confidence 0.75: signal works especially in squeeze/unwinding regimes.

results.description: Divide HF ownership percent by market cap to find concentrated small-cap HF positions (SUGGESTION1 & 4). Coverage 1.0. Confidence 0.62.

results.idea: Sector exposure * low specific risk (exposure / specific_risk_value_2)
results.description: Divide sector exposure (e.g., net_retail_exposure_score) by specific risk value to favor sector exposure with low idiosyncratic risk (SUGGESTION1). Coverage 1.0. Confidence 0.64.

results.idea: Momentum normalized (quantile momentum)
results.description: Applied quantile(rsk70_mfm2_usfast_momentum) to produce robust cross-sectional momentum signal (SUGGESTION1). Coverage 1.0. Confidence 0.8.

results.idea: Prospect daily * low HF crowding (prospect * inverse HF percent)
results.description: Multiply prospect daily specret by inverse HF ownership percent to find prospect signals with low HF crowding (SUGGESTION1 & 4). Coverage 1.0. Confidence 0.67.

results.idea: Residual momentum decayed (hump applied to momentum)
results.description: Used hump(rsk70_mfm2_usfast_momentum, hump=0.01) to limit turnover and emphasize persistent momentum (SUGGESTION1). Coverage 1.0. Confidence 0.7.

results.idea: Short interest normalized (quantile shortint)
results.description: Applied quantile to short interest to create robust ranking (SUGGESTION1). Coverage 1.0 and high userCount. Confidence 0.68.

results.idea: HF ownership count momentum (ts_zscore HF count returns)
results.description: Used ts_zscore on ts_returns of hedge_fund_ownership_count to detect accelerating institutional adoption (SUGGESTION1 & 4). Coverage 1.0. Confidence 0.66.
